participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Jake is caring and responsible, often seen helping others. He has a playful side when it comes to his cats.
participant_1.background: my cats are very special to me. i am a construction worker. my dad taught me everything i know. i've 5cats. i enjoy building houses.

participant_2.name: Frank
participant_2.personality: Frank is easygoing and enjoys sharing stories from his past. He loves socializing and spending time outdoors.
participant_2.background: i've been retired for a years. i go gambling in my spare time. i move south during the winter. i like to grill outdoors.

content.text: yes   i have a brother   i live with him   my dad   and cat   you
